title: How to Kill Villagers Easily in Minecraft

steps.title: Dig deep holes that villagers can fall into.
steps.content: Dig deep holes that villagers can fall into. Villagers are attracted to pumpkins and doors, so put one down, then build a deep hole around it (as deep as you can). Then sit back and watch as the villagers fall to their doom!

steps.title: This gives you free rein to attack villagers.
steps.content: This gives you free rein to attack villagers. Put a bunch of TNT around him and make it explode! The Iron Golem will die or at least take a lot of damage (so you can easily kill it with a sword), leaving you to kill the villagers in any way you can think of.

steps.title: Lure a villager child and an Iron Golem into a lava-filled hole.
steps.content: Lure a villager child and an Iron Golem into a lava-filled hole. Iron Golems like giving children flowers, so spawn an Iron Golem and a villager child, but before you do, make a deep 1x3 hole with lava in the bottom and put a pumpkin behind it. The child will be attracted to the pumpkin and run for it, making it fall into the hole. The Iron Golem will chase it, and it too will fall.

steps.title: This makes it easier for you to kill villagers undisturbed.
steps.content: This makes it easier for you to kill villagers undisturbed. When night falls, the Iron Golem will be too busy killing monsters to care about you. So sneak into the villagers' houses at night and kill them!

steps.title: Send the villager to a place far from the village.
steps.content: Send the villager to a place far from the village. If villagers are far from Iron Golems, those mobs don't attack you. So, you can kill a villager without getting attacked.

steps.title: Prevent a villager from escaping by trapping them between cacti.
steps.content: Prevent a villager from escaping by trapping them between cacti. Just remember, cacti can't be placed next to other blocks (including itself); they can only be placed on sand.

steps.title: Zombies go after villagers at night.
steps.content: Zombies go after villagers at night. When zombies see a villager, they automatically try to kill it. Sometimes, they even form zombie groups that attack villages. These zombie attacks are called “zombie sieges”. Remember, you can't spawn zombies in the daytime, for they’ll burn to ashes, so wait until night. It will transform them.
